query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( PROCEDURE = int8eq, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint, COMMUTATOR = === )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === (procedure = int8eq, leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = BIGINT, commutator = '===')

query: CREATE OPERATOR !== ( PROCEDURE = int8ne, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint, NEGATOR = ===, COMMUTATOR = !== )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR !== (procedure = int8ne, leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = BIGINT, negator = '===', commutator = '!==')

query: SELECT  ctid, oprcom FROM    pg_catalog.pg_operator fk WHERE   oprcom != 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator pk WHERE pk.oid = fk.oprcom)
expected: SELECT ctid, oprcom FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator AS fk WHERE oprcom <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator AS pk WHERE pk.oid = fk.oprcom)

query: SELECT  ctid, oprnegate FROM    pg_catalog.pg_operator fk WHERE   oprnegate != 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator pk WHERE pk.oid = fk.oprnegate)
expected: SELECT ctid, oprnegate FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator AS fk WHERE oprnegate <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_operator AS pk WHERE pk.oid = fk.oprnegate)

query: CREATE OPERATOR <| ( PROCEDURE = int8lt, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR <| (procedure = int8lt, leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = BIGINT)

query: CREATE OPERATOR |> ( PROCEDURE = int8gt, LEFTARG = bigint, RIGHTARG = bigint, NEGATOR = <|, COMMUTATOR = <| )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR |> (procedure = int8gt, leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = BIGINT, negator = '<|', commutator = '<|')
